name: Taxi Cab Crazy Race 3D - City Racer Driver Rush
name_original: Taxi Cab Crazy Race 3D - City Racer Driver Rush
description:
PREPARE for the race of your life as you plow through cities racing cabs in your nitro infused taxis! Drive amazing vehicles while listening to sweet tunes and leaving your opponents in the dust!

FEATURES

- Single and multiplayer modes
- 5 awesome nitro infused taxis to unlock
- Gorgeous crazy style graphics
- Sweet soundtrack for all moods
- Awesome racing physics
- Old school retro style feel
- iPhone and iPad support
- Game Center Leaderboard

Having problems or want to leave us some feedback on a future update? We are dedicated to providing the highest level of support and we would love to hear from you! You can shoot us an email at support@icustomized.net.
